long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Imagine being able to dictate and listen to your emails effortlessly. With our new extension, itâ€™s possible! ğŸŒŸ

An innovative Gmail extension, based on advanced Text-to-Speech (TTS) technology, makes managing emails easier than ever before. ğŸ¤ğŸ“§

Dictation Feature:

Simply enable the dictation option in our pop-up, open a new message window, and start speaking. The extension will convert your words into text in the email. Perfect for those who value their time and convenience!

Email Reading Feature:

Play your emails with a narratorâ€™s voice in two easy ways:

Select the text, right-click, and choose "Read selected". ğŸ–±ï¸
Select the text and click the icon that appears next to each email. ğŸ“§
Integrated Buttons:

The icon next to "archive" in the header of each email allows you to read the open email.
The icon next to "archive" when hovering over an email in the inbox list allows you to read the selected email.
Full Control:

Customize settings in the pop-up menu:
Adjust narratorâ€™s volume ğŸ”Š
Choose voice: male or female ğŸš»
The pop-up menu is styled similarly to the popular Subtitle Reader extension, providing a clear and aesthetic look.
When reading messages, the narrator will read the selected content.

This extension is a true revolution in email management! Increase your productivity and comfort at work with our modern technology. ğŸŒğŸš€

â—Disclaimer: All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension has no affiliation or association with them or any third-party companies.â—
